text:
Qx+ (c+ A⊤λ) = 0 . (7.49)
Assuming that Qis invertible, we get
x= −Q−1(c+ A⊤λ) . (7.50)
Substituting (7.50) into the primal Lagrangian L(x,λ), we get the dual
Lagrangian
D(λ) = −1
2(c+ A⊤λ)⊤Q−1(c+ A⊤λ) −λ⊤b. (7.51)
